bill.title: Relating To The Land Use Commission.
bill.description: Specifies that a simple majority of affirmative votes from the members serving on the land use commission is required for any boundary amendment. Effective 7/1/3000. (HD2)

history.action: Referred to HSG, WAL, FIN, referral sheet 2
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Wednesday, 02-01-23 9:30AM in House conference room 312 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashimoto, Aiu, Kila, Kitagawa, Marten, Onishi, Todd, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 34) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to WAL.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on WAL with Representative(s) Hussey-Burdick voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kapela voting no (1) and Representative(s) Amato, Nakashima excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by WAL on Tuesday, 02-14-23 9:30AM in House conference room 430 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
Bill re-scheduled to be heard by WAL on Tuesday, 02-14-23 8:30AM in conference room 430 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Poepoe, Ganaden, Morikawa, Takayama, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Chun, Hashem.
Reported from WAL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 712) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.

Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Amato, Hussey-Burdick, Perruso voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kapela voting no (1) and Representative(s) Marten excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-24-23 10:00AM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Kitagawa, Aiu, Chun, Kahaloa, Kila, Kobayashi, Lamosao, Morikawa, Nishimoto, Takenouchi, Alcos, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Poepoe; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Cochran; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Garrett.
